biotools.summary: Server for computing small interfering RNA (siRNA) sequences which are best suited for mammalian RNA interference (RNAi).  The site accepts a sequence as input and returns a list of siRNA candidates.

bioschemas.name: siDirect
bioschemas.summary: Server for computing small interfering RNA (siRNA) sequences which are best suited for mammalian RNA interference (RNAi).  The site accepts a sequence as input and returns a list of siRNA candidates.
